snippet: Go ahead and relax: Next season's menswear fashion will be easy to wear and at times even athletic without requiring, or necessarily even inspiring, actual exertion on the part of the wearer....

headline.print_headline: Milan Fashion Designers Say: 'Go Ahead and Relax'
headline.main: Milan Fashion Designers Say: 'Go Ahead and Relax'

lead_paragraph: Go ahead and relax: Next season's menswear fashion will be easy to wear and at times even athletic without requiring, or necessarily even inspiring, actual exertion on the part of the wearer.
